thread.title: NATO, Syria & Ukraine in ‘post fake’ world: Munich Security Conference highlights & memorable quotes
thread.title_full: NATO, Syria & Ukraine in ‘post fake’ world: Munich Security Conference highlights & memorable quotes

author: RT
title: NATO, Syria & Ukraine in ‘post fake’ world: Munich Security Conference highlights & memorable quotes
text:
NATO, Syria & Ukraine in ‘post fake’ world: Munich Security Conference highlights & memorable quotes Published time: 20 Feb, 2017 04:25 Get short URL © Munich Security Conference / Facebook The future of NATO and its relations with Russia amid turbulent US foreign policy, as well as the Syrian and Ukrainian conflicts in an era of Cold War style media hysteria have dominated the three-day Munich Security Conference. Trends Russia-NATO relations , Syria unrest , Ukraine turmoil NATO’s future & relations with Russia 
Russia is ready to work together with NATO, but its expansion has led to an “unprecedented level of tension” in Europe, the Russian FM Sergey Lavrov told the conference. Moscow is open for political dialogue and diplomacy but believes it does not make any sense without military cooperation. NATO, however, has not shown a readiness for such cooperation.
